name: Space Black Friday
description:
This is my entry for libGDXJam 2015. It's only a small amount of the original planning, because gamejam. This game is open source, and you can find the source here: https://github.com/nehpe/libgdxjam. I wrote some thoughts about the game during production here: http://nehpe.com/blog/tag/libgdxjam.html.

I also streamed some of the development on my twitch channel here: http://twitch.tv/nehpe_, and posted screenshots via twitter: http://twitter.com/nehpe_

The theme of the gamejam was "Life In Space"

GAME

You play as a "Space Miner" (i.e. a miner, but someone who mines space objects (asteroid, comets, moons)). Upon breaking through a rock wall, you find yourself in the middle of a Space Super Store (for aliens). Not wanting to miss out on the CRAZY savings, you have to beat up / kill other store patrons to get their savings.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move, and arrow keys to shoot
